titles: The couragious gallant; or, Cupid degraded. True lovers grief may find relief, good wine will cure the cause; then fill the glass, and let it pass, a figg for Cupids laws. To the tune of, Four-pence-half-penny-farthing. This may be printed, R.P.
publisher: Printed for I[onah]. Deacon, at the Angel in Guilt-spur-street without Newgate.,
notes: Place, date of publication, and publisher's name from Wing.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University, Houghton Library.
